moreBlocks.articles:
• Family Law
    We represent individuals throughout the Kansas City Metropolitan and surrounding areas in many areas of family law.
  • Post-Divorce Modifications
    After your divorce is final and the decree and other documents have been filed, you may find circumstances have changed and new orders need to be explored.
  • Estate Planning
    Don’t make the mistake of waiting too long to prepare a will or trust.
  • Personal Injury
    When you are injured or a loved one dies because of the negligence of others, it is important to contact an attorney quickly to get an honest assessment of the situation and to develop a plan.
  • DUI, DWI and Traffic Law
    If you have been charged with driving under the influence (DUI), driving while intoxicated (DWI) or other traffic violations, contact our firm.

description:
If you retain Morrison Law, LLC, we promise you what we promise all of our clients: personal care that starts with a free, one-on-one consultation and continues for as long as you need us.

Simply stated, we are in the business of helping people going through real-life problems. The end of a marriage is a milestone in your life where legal complexities combine with emotionally charged issues.

Your focus should be on your family while we attend to all the legal aspects of a life-changing, sometimes traumatic event. Attorney Eric Morrison is an experienced attorney licensed in Kansas and Missouri. The founder of our firm is also a skilled trial lawyer who places his focus on your rights while fighting for your best interests.

Specific areas of our family law practice include:

  • Divorce
  • Property division
  • Child custody/parenting time
  • Child support
  • Spousal support/maintenance/alimony
  • Post-divorce modifications and relocations

This may be your first time needing an attorney. In addition to the personal stress you are dealing with, you also fear the costs of retaining experienced counsel. Morrison Law, LLC, is a legal practice managed with low overhead costs, even if your case goes to trial.

We will pass that benefit onto you with affordable fees for personalized representation and timely and responsive communication.

In addition to family law cases, we also manage the legal concerns of Kansas City metropolitan residents in personal injury and wrongful death claims, estate planning, DUI arrests, and traffic violations.
